item.title: [PI] Mithril Seeds are glitched! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527173.0
Add server sided clipping^
And then use something like this to handle itâ€™s walk:

	if (Region.getClipping(c.getX() - 1, c.getY(), c.heightLevel, -1, 0)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1, 0);
		} else if (Region.getClipping(c.getX() + 1, c.getY(), c.heightLevel, 1, 0)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(1, 0);
		} else if (Region.getClipping(c.getX(), c.getY() - 1, c.heightLevel, 0, -1)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(0, -1);
		} else if (Region.getClipping(c.getX(), c.getY() + 1, c.heightLevel, 0, 1)) {
			c.getPA().walkTo(0, 1);
		}
